SEARCH
Package interfaces

Interface ScheduleInterface

All Known Implementing Classes:
ScheduleUI
public interface ScheduleInterface
This interface defines methods related to managing a doctor's schedule. It includes functionality for viewing the schedule, setting a new schedule, adding or removing specific time slots from the doctor's calendar.

The methods in this interface are intended to be implemented by classes that provide functionality for managing and updating a doctor's schedule, including time management.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    void
    addSchedule(LocalDate date, LocalTime time, Doctor doctor)
    Adds a new time slot to the doctor's schedule.
    void
    removeSchedule(LocalDate date, LocalTime time, Doctor doctor)
    Removes a specific time slot from the doctor's schedule.
    void
    setSchedule(Scanner sc, Doctor doctor)
    Allows the doctor to set their schedule for appointments.
    void
    viewSchedule(Doctor doctor)
    Displays the schedule of a specific doctor.

  • Method Details

    • viewSchedule

      void viewSchedule(Doctor doctor)
      Displays the schedule of a specific doctor.
      Parameters:
      doctor - The Doctor whose schedule is to be viewed.

    • setSchedule

      void setSchedule(Scanner sc, Doctor doctor)
      Allows the doctor to set their schedule for appointments.
      Parameters:
      sc - A Scanner object for reading user input.
      doctor - The Doctor who is setting their schedule.

    • addSchedule

      void addSchedule(LocalDate date, LocalTime time, Doctor doctor)
      Adds a new time slot to the doctor's schedule.
      Parameters:
      date - The LocalDate of the appointment.
      time - The LocalTime of the appointment.
      doctor - The Doctor whose schedule is being updated.

    • removeSchedule

      void removeSchedule(LocalDate date, LocalTime time, Doctor doctor)
      Removes a specific time slot from the doctor's schedule.
      Parameters:
      date - The LocalDate of the appointment to be removed.
      time - The LocalTime of the appointment to be removed.
      doctor - The Doctor whose schedule is being updated.
